page.title: 12The Van & Estate Centre
page.content: The above business is run by Mr Garry Povey.He is a{motor trader}dealing mainly in{new}and{second hand cars, {estate cars,vans}and{light commercial {vehicles}up to 7\ tons gross weight. Mr Povey employs 2 other men.Both skilled in motor vehicle repairs and renovation.One is a panel beater, the other is a paint sprayer.The general running of the business and vehicle sales he does himself.The premises, workshop and sales forecourt, are rented from Dinmore Caravans next door The firm offers full accident repairs & vehicle respray facilities.{24 hour {breakdown service. Self_drive}van and {car hire.}It's{open 6 days a week}from {9.00am _ 7.00pm.}Mr Povey is quite happy to sell either foreign or British vehicles.At present he has about 15 assorted vans & cars for sale {He is not an agent for a manufacturer.
